name: Soap Dodgem Challenging Puzzle
description:
“Fun, fresh and impeccably polished, Soap Dodgem comes highly recommended to anyone who enjoys a challenging and content-packed puzzle game.” by http://ifanzine.com
“The least developers can do is introduce a unique theme to make their game stand out. Fortunately, Lost Ducks did this with their new mobile puzzle game Soap Dodgem.” By gamegulp.ph

Explore the mazes of Bathroomia and solve tricky puzzles in this challenging logic game!

- Just swipe up, down, left, and right to move your soap squad
- Jump onto your dirty enemies to wipe them off the floor
- Find all hidden Golden Bubbles to obtain the badge of Perfectly Clean!
- Get the latest levels from the Cloud!
- Super easy level editor!
- Social Features: Share your levels with your friends to get the most likes!
- Real head-scratcher puzzles on 100 campaign levels!
- High level of quality minimalist cartoon graphics!
- Original Music by Award winner Csabi Kalotas
- Easy to play, challenging to master!
- Available iPhone and iPad devices
